programme.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days
programme.sub-title: More to Love: A Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Gino packs for his trip to Panama to meet Jasmine. Memphis is ready to marry a Tunisian man she's never met before. Caleb and Alina prepare to meet after 13 years. Kim plans to fly across the world for her last shot at love with Usman.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days
programme.sub-title: First Look: Catching Flights to Catch Feelings
programme.desc: Jasmine's jealousy rears its head. Memphis has a secret about her ex. Alina worries that Caleb doesn't understand her abilities. Usman's friends do not support his relationship with Kim. Mike's friends believe Ximena is using him.

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: Aspyn and Mitch are getting married with bagpipes, kilts and lots of flower girls. It's a perfect day but the officiant has lost his voice and the Browns are stressing because they now have to move to Flagstaff within a month!

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: With her weight spiraling, Tammy makes a life-altering decision. Amy finally gets a taste of the life she's always wanted, but, unfortunately, it's short-lived. An emergency surgery has repercussions for Chris.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Tammy is back from rehab, and Amy kisses her freedom goodbye as she comes to a drastic decision regarding her sister. With his bariatric surgery on the line, Chris tries to shed the weight he's gained but is shocked when he and Tammy step on the scale.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Amy is upset that Tammy's new nurse isn't pushing her enough. Tammy has started slacking, and the family worries about what could be the cause. Chris and Tammy clash when he confronts her about the new man in her life.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Paula has had a tough life and, at more than 600 pounds, has built a wall around herself to push people away. When she suddenly loses someone she loves, Paula can no longer ignore the threat of losing her own life -- especially for her children's sake.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: At 670 pounds Ashley must live in her parents' home with her husband. Desperate to save her life and her marriage, she decides it's time for a drastic change.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Most of the extreme weight on Tracey's body resides in her shockingly misshapen legs. They're so massive with severe lymphedema, that gastric surgery is her only chance of survival. Brenda and Melissa prepare for skin removal surgery.

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Kay denies that she is a hoarder, but a home filled with clutter and deadly vermin tells another story.

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Sherry's hoard has broken up her marriage and authorities are threatening to take away her children and condemn her home.

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.sub-title: My Teeth Are Lost in the Pile
programme.desc: When Kyle first met Lynn, he thought she was the answer to all of his problems, but years later, she's transformed his home into a heap of trash. Now on the verge of foreclosure, the couple will either get along enough to clean, or kill each other trying.

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Laura's collecting has spiralled into a compulsion that has left the relationships with her two sons on the brink of collapse.

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: When Child Protection Services removes Karen's children from her home, she is given just 48 hours to clean up or risks losing custody of her kids permanently.

programme.title: Too Large
programme.desc: Jennifer used to do everything with her family, but a car accident five years ago led to severe weight gain and a massive lymphedema on her leg. Jennifer feels like bariatric surgery is her last chance to regain mobility and get her family life back.

programme.title: Too Large
programme.desc: Plagued by health problems, Meghan hopes to get weight loss surgery along with her overweight best friend, Vannessa. Vannessa is afraid of trying to lose weight only to fail. When she sees Meghan successfully lose weight, however, she changes her mind.

programme.title: Too Large
programme.desc: After a painful recovery from bariatric surgery, Meghan works hard to keep best friend Vannessa's diet on track. Vannessa wants the surgery too, but she struggles to maintain a healthy diet because all her groceries come from a local food pantry.

programme.title: Too Large
programme.desc: George is a kind-hearted kindergarten teacher who weighs nearly 700 pounds. He is determined to lose weight to help him win back his ex-girlfriend. As George works hard to lose weight, he discovers that the love he has been missing most is self-love.

programme.title: Too Large
programme.desc: Corey is a young gay man who is just getting back on his feet after being homeless. He has dreams of getting back into college and finding a serious relationship, but he needs to make huge changes if he is going to live his dreams - or live at all.

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: The Sister Wives announce to the kids that they've bought land in Flagstaff and they plan to move there within a month.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.sub-title: I'm Not the Size of a Hanger!
programme.desc: Southern bride Danielle gets some help from her girlfriends in the quest to find the perfect glamorous gown. Jen is having a beer-themed wedding, but wants her dress to be more traditional. Katie worries her large assets won't fit in her wedding gown.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Bride Lauren loves dressing sexy, but she also wants a gown that will still feel bridal. Ali wants to look like Beyoncé on her big day, so she'll need a sexy gown with tons of sparkle. Blair bought a very sexy dress and hopes her grandmother approves.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Sharde dreams of a colourful dress to suit her rainbow unicorn wedding, but her mother does not approve. Bride Spencer wants a very avant-garde and dramatic gown for her big day. Sarah is shocked when the scissors come out during her fitting appointment.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Paralympic snowboarder Amy Purdy isn't afraid to take risks, like waiting to find her dress just three weeks before the big day. Katie is the ultimate planner and brings a list ranking her top gowns.

programme.title: My Big Fat American Gypsy Wedding
programme.desc: Gypsy goth rocker Tuter goes to war with her glamorous and bling-loving mother, Jacy, when Mom refuses to let her marry in a all-black wedding gown. And a pushy 'momager' will stop at nothing to have her gypsy child pageant star, Kylei Jo, crowned queen.

programme.title: My Big Fat American Gypsy Wedding
programme.desc: Gypsy Trouble and her gorger fiancé may not have their dream biker-themed wedding because of their fierce, feuding mothers. Alanna's traditional eighth birthday party spirals into an epic battle between her American and Russian gypsy family members.

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: Chantel and Karen meet River's girlfriend. Pedro and Nicole learn more about his father's past and their family history. After a big fight with Jah, Winter reveals things about her relationship that she had been keeping from her family.

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: The family finds creative ways to help Winter let go of her relationship with Jah. Chantel decides to fly to the Dominican Republic to support Pedro after Nicole and Lidia both turn against him for disrespecting the family.

programme.title: The Family Chantel
programme.desc: The Dominican Republic girls' trip begins. Chantel struggles to keep her opinions to herself when she and Pedro meet up with his mom. Pedro pleads for Nicole's support in finding out answers about their father.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiancé: The Other Way
programme.desc: Ellie is selling it all to start a new life with Victor in Providencia. Corey is hiding a big secret from Evelin. Sumit takes Jenny to an astrologer for guidance. Ari invites an unwelcome guest. Steven is scared to tell Alina the truth about his past.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiancé: The Other Way
programme.desc: Ellie has surprising news for her friends. Ari's ex-husband makes an impression. Steven quits his job, and Alina prepares for her move. Kenny and Armando finally start planning their wedding. Jenny has only one option left to stay in India.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiancé: The Other Way
programme.desc: Ellie heads to Colombia without a plan. Jenny hopes to get answers with the Hare Krishnas. Kenny has been keeping a secret. Bini confronts Ari's ex-husband. Evelin drops a bomb on her sisters. Alina decides to test Steven's faithfulness.

programme.title: Sister Wives

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: The Brown family is finally moving to Flagstaff. Moving day is chaotic and the dream they are chasing is becoming a nightmare. There's rays of hope, but mostly it's tears as they face an uncertain future and leave so much behind.

programme.desc: A friend in need is a friend indeed, and these brides need all the help they can get from their besties!

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress

programme.title: Four Weddings

programme.title: Four Weddings

programme.title: My Big Fat American Gypsy Wedding
programme.desc: The son of Gypsy matriarch Nettie Stanley is getting married. When groom Whitey asks sister Dallas to be in the wedding, he risks her wild ways ruining everything. Later, a Roma teen is asked to host a family affair in hopes of a marriage proposal.

programme.title: My Big Fat American Gypsy Wedding
programme.sub-title: Rituals, Rules and the Ultimate Gypsy Test
programme.desc: A traditional gypsy mom demands that her daughter perform a series of ancient rituals to determine if she's ready to wed. Later, a gypsy teen plans to marry a gorger bad-boy against her family’s wishes.

programme.title: My Big Fat American Gypsy Wedding

programme.title: I Didn't Know I Was Pregnant
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, paramedics rush Anna to the hospital for what she believes is food poisoning, only to discover she's in labour, 41 weeks pregnant and didn't know it.

programme.title: I Didn't Know I Was Pregnant

programme.title: I Didn't Know I Was Pregnant

programme.title: I Didn't Know I Was Pregnant

programme.title: I Didn't Know I Was Pregnant
programme.desc: One night while her husband is away, Tiffany, diagnosed with PCOS, has abdominal pain she believes to be a rupturing cyst but is actually an infant she didn't know she was carrying.

programme.title: I Didn't Know I Was Pregnant
programme.desc: Ashley unknowingly conceives a child just two months after giving birth. One night, horrible cramps send her to the bathroom with an urge to push. She's shocked as she delivers a baby girl into her own hands, never aware she was even pregnant.

programme.title: I Didn't Know I Was Pregnant
programme.desc: When Christie experiences extreme pain and cramping, she heads to the emergency room with her mother.

programme.title: I Didn't Know I Was Pregnant

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: Meri and Janelle talk through old wounds after the family spins off in four directions. Christine takes Ysabel to have surgery in New Jersey, Janelle helps out while Evie gets foot surgery in North Carolina, Meri is in Utah, and Kody and Robyn stay home.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: With temperatures dropping, wardens watch the Canadian border for illegal hunting.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A look back at the most exciting moments of the season, as well as behind-the-scenes footage of what it takes to make a show about the Maine game wardens.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The Maine wardens search under the ice of a frozen lake for the victims of the worst snowmobile accident in recent history.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Excited hunters are in the woods because spring turkey hunting season has arrived. Laflamme investigates whether someone may have poached a hen. Spahr responds to a call where a girl was attacked by a dog.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Follow several wardens during a busy 24 hours as they patrol for poachers, tag black bears at night, search for a home invader with a K9 team, and respond to a search and rescue.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Mainers are racing to get their boats out on the water, while the wardens search for an elusive suspect in a jet ski hit-and-run. Also, a mysterious man arrives in Maine just after the Boston Marathon bombings and leaves a suicide note.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The wardens investigate several accidents caused by the mud, including rescuing a boy who was caught in a flash flood. Also, Parker investigates an ATV hit-and-run.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The Wardens use night vision to catch night hunters and poachers. Then, Warden Laflamme must take matters into his own hands to protect the public from a tragic outcome.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The Warden Service kicks into high gear as they search for poachers and crack down on dangerous activity with firearms.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Two teams of Wardens join forces to bust ATV scofflaws and end up in a dramatic high-speed chase.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Summer has arrived and people are filling up the woods and causing trouble. MacCabe finds a campsite where the occupants seem to have vanished, and the wardens search for a pot grow op after a drug deal went wrong.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Some of the wardens enter the annual moose-hunting lottery. Meanwhile, Craven tracks down the mythical Main mountain lion and the wardens try to find an elderly man lost in the woods.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Up in the North Woods along the Canadian border, things are very different. A warden looking for smugglers encounters a drunk driver with a gun, and a suicidal man enters the woods with a shotgun.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A new class of wardens are being trained to do search and rescues. A hiker vanishes on the Appalachian trail and the wardens lead one of the largest search and rescue operations in Maine's history to find her.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A look back at the most exciting moments and never-before-seen stories.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A notorious gang of poachers are up to their old tricks. Also, the wardens stop some suspects from fleeing the state and the forensic team investigates who shot at a woman in her backyard.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The rule is clear: one hunter one deer. But some hunters are greedy and the wardens are there to stop them. Plus, a deputy joins his first night-hunting stakeout, LaFlamme searches for an arrow that can help solve a mystery and a family covers up a crime.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A Facebook post leads the wardens to a gang of poachers, which turns into a manhunt when the ringleader skips bail. The wardens capture a flock of nuisance wild turkeys and search all night for a rabbit hunter lost in the snowy woods.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A sledder takes a jump that lands him in the hospital and the wardens investigate the crash. The wardens chase down a group of drunk snowmobilers. A strange pile of animal parts in the snow leads the wardens to a family of poachers.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A Smartphone with video evidence of a crime leads to a poacher. Two drunken sledders run over a warden and are chased through the woods. Herring hunts down a man that he knows with arrest warrants. LaFlamme helps a herd of deer in distress.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The start of the busy tourist season has the wardens out in full force. A dangerous fox is on the loose in a crowded campground-the wardens need to find it fast. An ATV rider appears to have been partying too hard and nearly causes a wipe out.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: As winter melts into spring, all kinds of wildlife are emerging, from baby raccoons to hungry black bears. A routine littering summons turns into a face off with a rabid pitbull. Some new evidence comes to light to revive an old deer poaching case.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Teams use helicopters to radio-collar moose. The wardens rescue two skiers lost in the backcountry. A drunk sledder is caught and blames his nephew. A warden extinguishes a barn fire. A man with outstanding poaching warrants is arrested.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Spring arrives and things start plunging through the ice. The wardens investigate a case of injured bald eagles.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: In Maine, a game warden's job changes with the seasons. Sergeant Spahr helps a fledgling owl that has taken a tumble and Warden Stevens and a medical team look for a distressed hiker into the night.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The entire warden service pulls together for a massive search effort for a missing boy. A second search for a lost hiker stretches the wardens to their limit. A pair of salmon poachers are caught in the act and a new K-9 is trained.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: An ATV trail becomes the site of a high-speed chase when a man with an outstanding warrant attempts to flee from the Maine Warden Service. With the weather warming up, the wardens deal with intentional violators and serial offenders while enforcing laws.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The wardens work around the clock to handle turkey hunting season and smelt runs. A search warrant is needed upon the discovery of poached turkeys. The wardens come across many animals including orphaned baby foxes, nuisance beavers and a python.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Fourth of July is one of the biggest weekends of the year in Maine and crowds are out to celebrate. Warden Ryan Fitzpatrick and Caribou PD join forces when a group of fifty teens trash private property during a wild bonfire party.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The wardens battle illegal marijuana across the state. It is dangerous work that often sees armed individuals protecting their land. Three teens are involved in an ATV crash that has the wardens stumped.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Most of the wildlife in Maine consists of moose, bear and deer. However, on occasion exotic animals make their way into the state and the wardens need to be prepared for anything. This time Sergeant Spahr wrangles a Boa Constrictor.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Summer has arrived and people are filling up the woods and causing trouble. MacCabe finds a campsite where the occupants seem to have vanished, and the wardens search for a pot grow op after a drug deal went wrong.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Some of the wardens enter the annual moose-hunting lottery. Meanwhile, Craven tracks down the mythical Main mountain lion and the wardens try to find an elderly man lost in the woods.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Up in the North Woods along the Canadian border, things are very different. A warden looking for smugglers encounters a drunk driver with a gun, and a suicidal man enters the woods with a shotgun.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Warden Blanchard shows a high school student there is no such thing as a boring day on the job. Warden LaFlamme is promoted to Corporal of Landowner Relations and passes the responsibilities of his district on to Warden Lounder.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: During the holiday season, Pete Herring visits a children's hospital in Portland with members of the K-9 unit and Alan Curtis donates game to a soup kitchen. Later, Scott Thrasher invites everyone to his home for a potluck supper.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Water recreation season has the wardens out in full force. The Dive Team suits up to respond to an emergency search and recovery call, An ATV rider with a camera on his helmet films his own crash and undercover safety patrols lead to potential OUI busts.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: As sportsmen arrive to take part in Maine's big game season, the wardens keep a watchful eye for night hunters and track down a deer poacher. Then, some hunters from out of state get a lesson in Maine's hunting laws.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Autumn's arrival brings hunters heading for the woods, keeping the wardens busy. While some obey the rules, others try to get around them. Sergeant Simmons and Warden McKenney investigate a poached moose.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: With the arrival of fall comes the great Maine moose season. Warden MacCabe goes on a six day hunt and takes you along for the ride. Also, wardens investigate a double moose kill, one of the worst wildlife crimes there is.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The game wardens are on the lookout for over eager sportsmen trying to bend the rules as the season comes to close. One warden catches a Canadian posing as an American while others bring a fugitive to justice.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The game wardens are guardians of Maine's wildlife, but they also protect the public. Warden Carter must find an injured bear. A search is mounted for a missing man in the woods. Wardens MacCabe and Stevens track down hunters.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The tail end of deer season tempts empty-handed hunters to break the law. The wardens work round the clock shifts to catch a night hunter and a family of armed felons. Spahr and Blanchard investigate a pair of deer shot under suspicious circumstances.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Maine's busy deer hunting season keeps the wardens on their toes. An intentional violator in Aroostook County is busted night hunting. A hunter misidentifies his target and shoots an antlerless deer and feuding neighbors hamper the wardens' investigation.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: At the start of hunting season in Maine, the wardens nab violators who are illegally illuminating wildlife, firing guns from their vehicles, and hunting over baited deer stands. Warden Lounder finds himself in a dangerous situation when he is surrounded.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: In the final weeks of moose season, not everyone is following the rules. The wardens investigate a family suspected of killing and wasting a moose. Blanchard and Christianson have to stop an illegally harvested moose from crossing the border.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The discovery of a dead beaver in a Skowhegan parking lot leads Warden Parker on an exhaustive investigation involving surveillance cameras, anonymous informants and the assistance of the local police.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: For a game warden, there's no such thing as being off the clock. Wardens McBrine and Carter embark on a multi-day hunt for a wanted man. Warden Herring investigates a mysterious shack on city property. Warden McKenney works to remove a deadly hazard.

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Jacqui and Andrew find gold in Queensland and the Dust Devils buy some new equipment.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: It's last chance for The Rookies' partnership. Col's crew is on a crash course as his reoccurring illness slows them down, while the Cooke Brothers fight busted hoses and breakdowns in the quest to strike it rich.

programme.title: Bering Sea Gold
programme.desc: With Kris away on father duty, Andy must bring in the gold as captain of the Reaper. Vernon tries to maximize his returns by minimizing his moves. Shawn finds himself just short of a paystreak. Zeke tries Shawn's coordinates to put some gold in the box.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Parker investigates a rotting bear carcass that was dumped on the side of the road, leading him on a hunt across Maine to find a potential poacher. Blanchard catches a couple behaving badly on a wildlife refuge. Robertson rescues some ducklings.

programme.title: Aussie Gold Hunters
programme.desc: Jacqui and Andrew find gold in Queensland and the Dust Devils buy some new equipment.

programme.desc: It's last chance for The Rookies' partnership. Col's crew is on a crash course as his reoccurring illness slows them down, while the Cooke Brothers fight busted hoses and breakdowns in the quest to strike it rich.

programme.desc: During the holiday season, Pete Herring visits a children's hospital in Portland with members of the K-9 unit and Alan Curtis donates game to a soup kitchen. Later, Scott Thrasher invites everyone to his home for a potluck supper.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Water recreation season has the wardens out in full force. The Dive Team suits up to respond to an emergency search and recovery call, An ATV rider with a camera on his helmet films his own crash and undercover safety patrols lead to potential OUI busts.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The wardens encounter all types of people willing to stretch the truth to get out of hot water. Warden Parker searches for a trigger-happy shooter in a family neighborhood. Sergeant Spahr and Warden Lounder investigate a suspiciously shot turkey.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Deep in the Maine woods, danger lurks behind every tree for the game wardens. Warden Herring comes across a sprawling illegal encampment on private property. Warden Stevens discovers three marijuana grows and must seize dozens of plants.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: A speeding dirt biker eludes Warden Robertson, but leaves a crucial clue to his whereabouts. Two dogs on the loose are chasing newborn deer. An ATV accident victim has an odd explanation for what caused his crash.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: On land and water, it's the wardens' job to keep people safe. Warden McBrine coordinates a LifeFlight helicopter for the victim of a serious car crash. Warden Buuck spreads the word on boating safety.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.sub-title: Close Encounters of the Wild Kind
programme.desc: When Maine's wildlife wanders into human territory, it's game wardens to the rescue. Wardens Marquis and Fitzpatrick try to catch a dumpster-diving bear. A wily woodchuck gives Warden Lounder a run for his money.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Whether it's protecting wildlife or ensuring public safety, the Maine Game Wardens are on double duty during the summer. Warden Jeremy Judd tries to rescue a baby skunk in distress. Wardens MacCabe and Robertson investigate a stolen ATV that disappeared.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The wardens race against the clock to evacuate an injured hiker on the Appalachian Trail. A fishing license check leads Warden Dan Christianson to a suspicious stash. Things run afoul as Warden Kris MacCabe discovers great blue herons acting strangely.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Simmons, Parker and Robertson catch sportsmen who fired from inside their truck. Spahr leads the search for a missing elderly woman in York County. The dive team is mustered to search for two duck hunters presumed drowned in the Sebasticook River.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Sergeant Spahr and Warden Lounder chase down a fleeing ATV. Warden Pelkey sends his K9 in search of evidence over a suspiciously shot moose. Warden MacCabe wrangles a tangled great blue heron.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Harvest season is the game wardens' busiest time. Warden Dudley helps an Amish family save their corn crop from a bear. Wardens Carter and McBrine hunt for a man hiding out in a cabin. Sergeant Thrasher searches for an illegal marijuana crop grower.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: The wardens wage a large-scale investigation into a moose that's been shot and left in the woods. A camouflaged ATV leads Warden Richardson to a convicted felon. Warden MacCabe runs across a hunter unlike any other.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: Hunting season heats up as Warden Herring calls in the air wing to track illegal activity on a game preserve. Warden Blanchard catches an intentional violator red-handed. Wardens Carter and McBrine execute a search warrant on a known poacher.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The ORBIS McDonnell Douglas DC-10 is the world's only flying eye hospital with an interior redesigned to house a state-of-the-art ophthalmic hospital complete with an operating room, a laser treatment facility and a high-tech classroom.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The Martin Mars water bomber is the world's biggest seaplane. Originally built in 1945 for the U.S. Navy, it was converted to a water bomber in 1958 and has since flown more than 8,000 firefighting missions.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The Airbus A380 is the world's first full double-deck passenger aircraft, a groundbreaking design in aviation history. We document the construction and delivery of a new aircraft, and Lufthansa's first commercial flight from Frankfort to San Francisco.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The Skibird is the lifeblood of remote science camps in Greenland and Antarctica, carrying supplies, fuel and crew to these outer worldly locations. The LC-130 Hercules Skibirds are operated by the New York Air National Guard's 109th Airlift Wing.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The Antonov 124 is the world's largest serially manufactured cargo plane. Built to move Soviet military vehicles and equipment, they are now in constant demand moving everything from locomotives to whales anywhere in the world.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The C-5 Galaxy is the biggest and most powerful plane in the U.S. Air Force fleet. Follow its mission into a war zone, from initial briefing to descent into Bagram, Afghanistan.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: In December 1995, a state-of-the-art Boeing 757 bound for Cali, Colombia, slammed into a mountain after going 19 kilometres off-course. The investigation reveals that the pilots were baffled by the plane's sophisticated automation.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: In 1990, a Columbian flight hit a massive storm on its way to New York, forcing the plane to remain in a holding pattern above the city. Finally running out of fuel, the plane crashes into a wealthy suburb, resulting in controversial conclusions.

programme.desc: In April 1998, Aloha Airlines Flight 243 took off from Maui for a short island hop to Honolulu; at 24,000 feet, a huge chunk of the plane's roof and walls broke off but against all odds the plane lands safely.

programme.title: North Woods Law
programme.desc: In the dark of the night, Officers Hannet and Masucci rush to the aid of an injured hiker trapped on Mount Monadnock. Lt. Cheney and Officer Jones patrol the Hooksett Dam where river herring are spawning, and a bear causes chaos at Twin Mountain.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete journeys to Kauai to build a sky-wave treehouse for a couple who ditched the mainland for a laid-back lifestyle and transforms a bohemian treehouse for two former professional surfers into a masterpiece with a crow's nest 60 ft off the ground.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete heads to Alabama's Appalachia to build a super spy treehouse. There, he pulls out all the stops to make the client's espionage-themed dreams come true. We're talking gadgets, hidden passageways, secret rooms and more.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: The NTS crew travels to an alpaca farm to build a lodge in the trees inspired by our National Parks. They create a structure to take in the mountain views with a 50 foot long cable bridge entrance and a deck devoted entirely to hammock lounging.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.sub-title: Never Too Old for a Treehouse

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A parolee is assigned a difficult adoption case featuring a cast of renaissance fair pirates looking to add a pit bull to their crew. Meanwhile, Tia's husband faces a bail hearing after an 18-month wait.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia and her daughter, Tania, bond during an emotional rescue mission that takes them to a Sacramento rescue shelter, stopping en route to rescue a stray pit bull found wandering outside the gates of Wasco State Prison.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia deals with an endless series of crises as her older daughter Tania refuses to pull her weight and a parolee goes missing.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia and her team are tasked with tracking down a pit bull that has been living wild in a local park. It's a dangerous assignment and one that proves far harder than Tia ever expected.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees

programme.title: Cold Valley
programme.desc: Between 1979 and 1982, five young people went missing or were found murdered in the Lewis Clark Valley area. Detective Jackie Nichols picks up the trail and begins her hunt for an elusive serial killer who has evaded justice for over forty years.

programme.title: Cold Valley
programme.desc: Detective Jackie Nichols continues her hunt for an elusive serial killer responsible for the murder and disappearances of five young people in the Lewis Clark Valley.

programme.title: Cold Valley
programme.desc: Detective Jackie Nichols re-examines decades old evidence and deconstructs her suspect's alibi in an effort to once and for all separate fact from fiction.

programme.title: Cold Valley
programme.desc: Detective Jackie Nichols and amateur sleuth Gloria Bobertz ramp up their investigations into the Lewis Clark Valley serial murders and take a deeper dive into their Person of Interests disturbing past.

programme.title: Jo Frost on Killer Kids
programme.desc: Jacqui Bartlam was killed by her own son in 2011. Jo Frost talks to her partner at the time, as well as with a criminologist, neuroscientists, and criminal justice expert to try and understand if children can be born evil.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: A local racing legend is devastated when he's told he must quit street racing.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: After three years of taunting, Doc calls out Murder Nova to race for the crown.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: While preparing to race Doc, Murder Nova does a test on the street that draws the attention of the police.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Chuck and Flip's smack talk at a poker tournament leads to another call out.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Doc and Shawn face each other in a rematch for the Crown of Oklahoma's fastest street car.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The rivalry between Daddy Dave and Shawn comes to a head when Dave calls out Shawn for the number one spot.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The Red River Rivalry gets renewed in a battle between Texas versus Oklahoma drivers.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Farmtruck and AZN must face off against newbie racers who want to get on the top ten list. Old state rivalries lead to big brawls when Texas racers LMR want to change the rules on the OKC guys.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Big Chief strikes a deal with loudmouth racer Freakin' Rican, allowing him to call out #10 Farmtruck in exchange for bootleg fireworks. There's a shakeup in the middle of the list when #8 Derek gets called out by newcomer #9 Andrade.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: After an expensive overhaul of his car, Murder Nova calls out Daddy Dave in an unforgettable rematch showdown.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Tina Pierce, known by locals to be the fastest female racer in Oklahoma, calls out #10 Farmtruck. Old family rivalries come to a head when #8 Varley and #9 Andrade Jr. face off, while #6 Chuck and #7 Derek race for a $1000 and the #6 spot.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Daddy Dave and #2 Murder Nova square off while best friends #3 Doc and #4 Monza battle on the street for the first time. After installing a secret weapon on his Monte Carlo, Doc is painfully reminded that testing on the street is very illegal.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: With the help of some racing legends, Big Chief resurrects his first racecar, a '72 Pontiac LeMans he calls The Crow. The OKC's Top 3 take on some expert race car builders' best to hold their coveted title of 'Fastest Street Cars in the Nation.'.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Big Chief relinquishes his racemaster duties to another driver so he can race The Crow back up the list. Tina drops off the list, opening the coveted 10-spot for a round robin competition. Varley's son/ driver is a no show. Azn gets stopped by the police.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Track racers from Tulsa call out the 405 with hopes of taking down the 'fastest street-raced cars in the country.' Farmtruck and AZN attempt a garage sale. Both Murder Nova and Chuck upgrade to twin turbo.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Racemaster Farmtruck devises a plan to have the top 5 racers battle each other to shake up the top 10 list. AZN fishes for races with the Dung Beetle as Varley's son Shelby takes over the Gold Car driving duties and attempts to get them back on the list.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The OKC's best drivers take a road trip to The Big Easy to take on New Orleans' fastest street cars. Big Chief resurrects Flip's El Camino. Texan racer Boosted GT tries to get on the 405's list.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Doc is determined to make a comeback with the Street Beast. Big Chief and Kamikaze decide it's time for the El Camino to race for the list. Farmtruck and AZN go after redemption with an old rival with the Dung Beetle.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: OKC racers take on the fastest of the south at the annual Cash Days race. While fishing for street races and fast cash, Farmtruck and AZN meet their match.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Big Chief finally calls out his best friend Murder Nova in hopes of taking the number one spot from Daddy Dave. Drag racer Kayla Morton and former Texan Boosted GT take their shot at the list. Farmtruck's dream for a new sleeper is AZN's worst nightmare.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Oklahoma City's fastest take on the trash-talking street racers from Chicago. When many of the races get rained out, both sides agree to a rematch in Oklahoma. Meanwhile, the Farmtruck is back to its old 'fishing' ways, reeling in a Ferrari and a Camaro.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The Farmtruck is back, with a new motor and Chuck has his turbos lined out on The Death Trap. They both want back on the list. It's a war on the streets of the 405 with some of the fastest, closest drag racing ever.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Chief and Shawn plan to take over the list, but no one's going to make it easy. Dead batteries and loud mouth Texans mess with Shawn's head, enough where he considers dropping off the list.

programme.title: Pale Rider
programme.desc: When property owner Coy LaHood (Richard Dysart) starts using a band of hooligans to terrorize a group of small-town gold miners into giving up their territory, an enigmatic man named "Preacher" (Clint Eastwood) arrives in town. Preacher fends off the attacks, and then goes directly to LaHood to negotiate. When the miners, led by Hull Barret (Michael Moriarty), refuse the terms, LaHood sends in Marshall Stockburn (John Russell) to take down Preacher and the others.

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: The Coldest Hunt: Nunivak Island Muskox
programme.desc: Lightning strikes twice: Steve has somehow beaten the odds and drawn a second Muskox tag after having to forfeit his first one four years ago due to unforeseen circumstances. Steve's only regret in life was passing up his opportunity to hunt Muskox.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild
programme.desc: Mario hooks up with old friend and current world record holder for kingfish Rick Pollock . They fish the the coast of Newzealand just off a live Volcano, then tragedy strikes…… after the Volcano erupts mario returns to catch a whopping Bass Grouper and prepares an amazing ceviche dish.

programme.title: Kid Rodeo
programme.desc: The stage is set as the kids arrive in Las Vegas. Jayci Lee is forced to compete on a horse she's never ridden after her trusted companion could not make the trip. Meanwhile, Bradlee starts strong but both Madison and Koby have shockingly bad runs as their chances for a title start to dwindle.

programme.title: Jim Shockey's Hunting Adventures
programme.sub-title: My Fav Big Game Animal to Hunt in North America: Tule Elk California
programme.desc: Jim sneaks in an early pre-rut hunt, traveling to California with his TC muzzle loader to hunt a unique species of elk -- the tule elk.

However, Alexis is more than a match for Tank's shock tactics, leaving him torn between loyalty to Dustin and a growing attraction toward Alexis.

programme.title: Borg vs. McEnroe
programme.desc: It's the summer of 1980, and Björn Borg is the top tennis player in the world, dominating the sport both on and off the court. A powerful and rigorously disciplined player, there is only one obstacle in his pursuit of a record-breaking fifth Wimbledon championship: the highly talented but ferociously abrasive young American John McEnroe. With three days until the tournament begins, Borg trains religiously in his lavish Monaco home, aided by his coach and mentor Lennart and girlfriend Mariana.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: When decorated military officer Chris Vaughn (The Rock) returns to his hometown in the state of Washington to find work, he finds that the lumber mill has closed, and the town's big business is now a seedy casino operated by one of his old schoolmates, Jay Hamilton (Neal McDonough). Aided by his loyal friend Ray Templeton (Johnny Knoxville), Vaughn tries to make a stand against the area's crime and corruption, but, finding no help from the police, he must take matters into his own hands.

programme.title: Queen Bees
programme.desc: While her house undergoes repairs, fiercely independent senior Helen temporarily moves into a nearby retirement community, where she encounters lusty widows, cutthroat bridge tournaments and a hotbed of bullying "mean girls.".

programme.title: Delivery Man
programme.desc: Amiable slacker David Wozniak (Vince Vaughn) drives a delivery truck for his family's company and is content with a life of mediocrity. However, when he learns that he is the biological father of more than 500 offspring and many of them are suing to learn his identity, he decides to hold himself accountable for his actions. He finds some of his progeny and becomes involved in their lives; however, when David's girlfriend announces her pregnancy, she keeps her expectations low.

programme.title: The Change-Up
programme.desc: Once inseparable pals, Dave (Jason Bateman) and Mitch (Ryan Reynolds) have drifted apart over the years. Dave is an overworked lawyer and family man, while Mitch has thus far avoided most of the normal responsibilities of adulthood. Each is envious of the other's life, and following a drunken binge, the men awake to find they have somehow switched bodies. Dave and Mitch soon discover that things are not as rosy as they seemed and try to find a way to return their lives to normal.

programme.title: L.A. Confidential
programme.desc: Three policemen, each with his own motives and obsessions, tackle the corruption surrounding an unsolved murder at a downtown Los Angeles coffee shop in the early 1950s. Detective Lieutenant Exley (Guy Pearce), the son of a murdered detective, is out to avenge his father's killing. The ex-partner of Officer White (Russell Crowe), implicated in a scandal rooted out by Exley, was one of the victims. Sergeant Vincennes (Kevin Spacey) feeds classified information to a tabloid magnate (Danny DeVito).

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: The last members of a dying Native American tribe, the Mohicans -- Uncas (Eric Schweig), his father Chingachgook (Russell Means), and his adopted half-white brother Hawkeye (Daniel Day-Lewis) -- live in peace alongside British colonists. But when the daughters (Madeleine Stowe, Jodhi May) of a British colonel are kidnapped by a traitorous scout, Hawkeye and Uncas must rescue them in the crossfire of a gruesome military conflict of which they wanted no part: the French and Indian War.

programme.title: Detainee 001

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: Businessman Oskar Schindler (Liam Neeson) arrives in Krakow in 1939, ready to make his fortune from World War II, which has just started. After joining the Nazi party primarily for political expediency, he staffs his factory with Jewish workers for similarly pragmatic reasons. When the SS begins exterminating Jews in the Krakow ghetto, Schindler arranges to have his workers protected to keep his factory in operation, but soon realizes that in so doing, he is also saving innocent lives.

programme.title: Step Up Revolution
programme.desc: Newly arrived in Miami, young dancer Emily (Kathryn McCormick) dreams of becoming a professional. She soon meets and falls in love with Sean (Ryan Guzman), the leader of a dance crew called "the Mob." When a rich businessman's plans to develop the dancers' historic neighborhood threatens to displace thousands of people, Emily must join forces with Sean and the Mob to turn their performance art into protest art, even though doing so may place her dreams in jeopardy.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: Attempting to win the favor of the newly divorced Suzanne (Nia Long), Nick (Ice Cube) offers to accompany her children, Lindsey (Aleisha Allen) and Kevin (Philip Bolden), on a flight from Portland, Ore., to Canada to see their mother. A mishap with a corkscrew and a metal detector gets the troupe banned from the flight, however, so Nick is forced to drive the kids in his prized Lincoln Navigator. Tensions inevitably rise during the long road trip, but Nick is not to be deterred.

programme.title: Are We Done Yet?
programme.desc: Nick (Ice Cube) and Suzanne (Nia Long) decide to move to the suburbs to create a better life for children Lindsey (Aleisha Allen) and Kevin (Philip Bolden). The contractor (John C. McGinley) they hire to renovate their home has a rather odd way of doing business, complicating the family's move. Matters spiral further out of control when the contractor clashes with Nick but bonds with Suzanne and the children.

programme.title: 7 Days in Entebbe
programme.desc: In July 1976, four terrorists hijack an Air France flight from Tel-Aviv to Paris and force the flight crew to land in Entebbe, Uganda. There, the Jewish passengers are held hostage, with their safety contingent on the release of dozens of terrorists jailed in Israel, Germany and Sweden. After considerable debate, the Israeli government employs the Israeli Defense Forces to execute a daring rescue.

programme.title: The Guest
programme.desc: A string of mysterious deaths leads a teenager to become suspicious of a soldier (Dan Stevens) who showed up on her family's doorstep and claimed to be a friend of her dead brother.

programme.title: Step Up Revolution
programme.desc: Newly arrived in Miami, young dancer Emily (Kathryn McCormick) dreams of becoming a professional. She soon meets and falls in love with Sean (Ryan Guzman), the leader of a dance crew called "the Mob." When a rich businessman's plans to develop the dancers' historic neighborhood threatens to displace thousands of people, Emily must join forces with Sean and the Mob to turn their performance art into protest art, even though doing so may place her dreams in jeopardy.

programme.title: Attica
programme.desc: During the summer of 1971, tensions between inmates and guards at the Attica Correctional Facility are at an all-time high. On the morning of Sept. 9, it all comes to a head as Attica becomes the stage for one of the largest U.S. prison riots ever.

programme.title: Ricky Powell: The Individualist
programme.desc: Photographer Ricky Powell captures the music, fashion and art scene in New York City in the 1980s and '90s.

programme.title: Rolling Like Thunder
programme.desc: Stories of myth-like artists, remarkable romances and competitive battles reveal the risk behind freight train and graffiti culture (New!).

programme.title: You're Watching Video Music Box
programme.desc: "Video Music Box," launched in 1983 and hosted in New York City by DJ Ralph McDaniels, showcases hip-hop videos and introduces viewers to future stars like Nas, Jay Z, LL Cool J, Nicki Minaj and Fat Joe long before they become icons of the genre (New!).

programme.title: Zola
programme.desc: Zola, a Detroit waitress, is seduced into a weekend of stripping in Florida for some quick cash -- but the trip becomes a sleepless 48-hour odyssey involving a nefarious friend, her pimp and her idiot boyfriend.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: When their parents decide to sell their home, siblings Maura (Amy Poehler) and Kate (Tina Fey) learn that they have one weekend to clean out the junk from their old bedroom. Unhappy with the news, the recently divorced Maura and her hotheaded sister make plans to throw one final bash to recapture their glory days with their former classmates. As the raging party begins to spiral out of control, the gals soon realize that there may not be a house left once the dust settles.

programme.title: FXM Presents
programme.desc: An examination of the process of making movies follows a production from script to screen.

programme.title: The Three Faces of Eve
programme.desc: Suffering from headaches and inexplicable blackouts, timid housewife Eve White (Joanne Woodward) begins seeing a psychiatrist, Dr. Luther (Lee J. Cobb). He's stunned when she transforms before his eyes into the lascivious Eve Black, and diagnoses her as having multiple personalities. It's not long before a third, calling herself Jane, also appears. Through hypnosis and continued therapy, Luther struggles to help Eve recall the trauma that caused her identity to fracture.

programme.title: The Rocket Man
programme.desc: An orphan (George Winslow) zaps his town with a spaceman's ray gun that makes people tell the truth.

programme.title: All About Eve
programme.desc: Backstage story revolving around aspiring actress Eve Harrington. Tattered and forlorn, Eve shows up in the dressing room of Broadway mega-star Margo Channing, telling a melancholy life story to Margo and her friends. Margo takes Eve under her wing, and it appears that Eve is a conniver that uses Margo.

programme.title: The Song of Bernadette
programme.desc: Based on the popular novel by Franz Werfel, this drama focuses on Bernadette Soubirous (Jennifer Jones), a young French woman who experiences vivid visions of the Virgin Mary. While many dismiss her claims, certain people, including the priest Dominique Peyramale (Charles Bickford), slowly begin to believe her. Eventually, Bernadette is deemed a saint, and becomes a nun at a convent, where she must deal with jealousy from others who resent her revered status.

programme.title: The Robe
programme.desc: In this biblical epic, a drunk and disillusioned Roman, Marcellus Gallio (Richard Burton), wins Jesus' robe in a dice game after the crucifixion. Marcellus has never been a man of faith like his slave, Demetrius (Victor Mature), but when Demetrius escapes with the robe, Marcellus experiences disturbing visions and feels guilty for his actions. Convinced that destroying the robe will cure him, Marcellus sets out to find Demetrius -- and discovers his Christian faith along the way.

programme.title: Demetrius and the Gladiators
programme.desc: In this sequel to "The Robe," the corrupt emperor Caligula (Jay Robinson) believes that the sacred robe of Christ has magical powers, and will stop at nothing to obtain it. When Demetrius (Victor Mature) refuses to help Caligula find the holy object, Caligula has him arrested and forces him to fight in the arena in battles to the death. As Demetrius faces trial after trial, his faith in Christ is pushed to its limits, as he sees no point in the endless suffering he is forced to endure.

programme.title: The Star
programme.desc: A small but brave donkey named Bo yearns for a life beyond his daily grind at the village mill. One day, he finds the courage to break free, embarking on the adventure of his dreams. On his journey, he teams up with Ruth, a lovable sheep who has lost her flock, and Dave, a dove who has lofty aspirations. Along with three camels and some eccentric stable animals, Bo and his new friends follow the Star and become accidental heroes in the greatest story ever told -- the first Christmas.

programme.title: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
programme.desc: When his beloved grandfather leaves Jake clues to a mystery that spans different worlds and times, he finds a magical place known as Miss Peregrine's School for Peculiar Children. But the mystery and danger deepen as he gets to know the residents and learns about their special powers - and their terrifying enemies. Ultimately, Jake discovers that only his own special peculiarity can save his new friends. Based on the novel "Miss Peregrine's Home For Peculiar Children," written by Ransom Riggs.

programme.title: Krampus
programme.desc: While the holiday season represents the most magical time of year, ancient European folklore warns of Krampus, a horned beast who punishes naughty children at Christmastime. When dysfunctional family squabbling causes young Max (Emjay Anthony) to lose his festive spirit, it unleashes the wrath of the fearsome demon. As Krampus lays siege to the Engel home, mom (Toni Collette), pop (Adam Scott), sister (Stefania LaVie Owen) and brother must band together to save one another from a monstrous fate.

programme.title: Krampus
programme.desc: While the holiday season represents the most magical time of year, ancient European folklore warns of Krampus, a horned beast who punishes naughty children at Christmastime. When dysfunctional family squabbling causes young Max (Emjay Anthony) to lose his festive spirit, it unleashes the wrath of the fearsome demon. As Krampus lays siege to the Engel home, mom (Toni Collette), pop (Adam Scott), sister (Stefania LaVie Owen) and brother must band together to save one another from a monstrous fate.

programme.title: The Song of Bernadette
programme.desc: Based on the popular novel by Franz Werfel, this drama focuses on Bernadette Soubirous (Jennifer Jones), a young French woman who experiences vivid visions of the Virgin Mary. While many dismiss her claims, certain people, including the priest Dominique Peyramale (Charles Bickford), slowly begin to believe her. Eventually, Bernadette is deemed a saint, and becomes a nun at a convent, where she must deal with jealousy from others who resent her revered status.

programme.title: The Black Swan
programme.desc: With the pardon of notorious pirate Henry Morgan by the English King, Caribbean pirates are offered amnesty if they give up their lawless ways. As governor of Jamaica, Morgan picks Captain Jamie Waring to round up the renegade captain Billy Leech. Beautiful Margaret Denby complicates matters for Waring, as her scorn for him is matched only by his love for her.

programme.title: The Fly
programme.desc: When scientist Andre Delambre (Al Hedison) tests his matter transporter on himself, an errant housefly makes its way into the transportation chamber, and things go horribly wrong. As a result, Delambre's head and arm are now that of the insect. Slowly losing himself to the fly, Delambre turns to his wife, Helene (Patricia Owens), for help. But when tragedy strikes, Delambre's brother (Vincent Price) and Inspector Charas (Herbert Marshall) are forced to pick up the investigation.

programme.title: The Curse of the Fly
programme.desc: Scantily clad Patricia Stanley (Carole Gray) breaks out of a mental hospital and is picked up by passing motorist Martin Delambre (George Baker). The two do not reveal much about themselves to each other, but nevertheless decide to get married. At the Delambre family mansion, Patricia meets Martin's father, Henri (Brian Donlevy), an eccentric scientist. Snooping about the grounds, she discovers evidence of the family's strange experiments in teleportation and the grisly results thereof.

programme.title: Siberia
programme.desc: An American diamond merchant and his lover get caught in the crossfire when a business deal goes wrong in Russia.

programme.title: Safe
programme.desc: Luke Wright (Jason Statham) is a two-bit cage fighter, until the day he throws a fixed match. In retaliation, the Russian mob murders his family and destroys his life. Though alone and haunted by grief, Luke springs into action to save a Chinese girl (Catherine Chan) from the same gangsters who killed his family -- and lands in the middle of a high-stakes war. The girl is no ordinary child; she's a math prodigy who holds in her head a numerical code for which various factions are ready to kill.

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: Mercenary leader Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) and his loyal men take on what they think is a routine assignment: a covert operation to invade the South American country of Vilena and overthrow its dictator. But, when they learn that the job will be a suicide mission, they must choose redemption or the destruction of their brotherhood.

programme.title: The Expendables 2
programme.desc: Mercenary leader Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone), Lee Christmas (Jason Statham) and the rest of the Expendables team reunite when Mr. Church (Bruce Willis) hires them for a seemingly easy job. But things go terribly wrong, compelling the mercenaries to seek revenge for a comrade's murder. With the odds against them, Barney and his team are hell-bent on payback and cut a path of destruction through opposing forces, only to encounter an unexpected threat: six pounds of weapons-grade plutonium.

programme.title: The Expendables 3
programme.desc: Years ago, Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) co-founded the Expendables with Conrad Stonebanks (Mel Gibson). After Stonebanks became an arms dealer, Ross was forced to kill him -- or so he thought. Now, Stonebanks is back and he's on a mission to end the Expendables. Ross decides that the way to fight old blood is with new blood, so he assembles a team of younger, faster, more tech-savvy recruits. The battle to topple Stonebanks becomes a clash of old-school methods vs. high-tech expertise.

programme.title: The Expendables 3
programme.desc: Years ago, Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) co-founded the Expendables with Conrad Stonebanks (Mel Gibson). After Stonebanks became an arms dealer, Ross was forced to kill him -- or so he thought. Now, Stonebanks is back and he's on a mission to end the Expendables. Ross decides that the way to fight old blood is with new blood, so he assembles a team of younger, faster, more tech-savvy recruits. The battle to topple Stonebanks becomes a clash of old-school methods vs. high-tech expertise.

programme.title: Sodom and Gomorrah
programme.desc: Hebrew leader Lot (Stewart Granger) leads his people to a fertile valley adjacent to the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah, hotbeds of vice and corruption ruled by the merciless Queen Bera (Anouk Aimée). When Lot orders a dam to be busted in order to prevent destruction of the cities by the attacking Helamites, the queen, in gratitude, allows Lot's people to settle in Sodom. Soon, however, the veneer of civilization begins crumbling as Lot and the Hebrews become corrupted by the Sodomites.

programme.title: The Black Swan
programme.desc: With the pardon of notorious pirate Henry Morgan by the English King, Caribbean pirates are offered amnesty if they give up their lawless ways. As governor of Jamaica, Morgan picks Captain Jamie Waring to round up the renegade captain Billy Leech. Beautiful Margaret Denby complicates matters for Waring, as her scorn for him is matched only by his love for her.

programme.title: The Gods Must Be Crazy
programme.desc: The tribal people in a remote African desert live a happy life, but it is all torn to pieces when a Coca-Cola bottle falls from a plane. With the villagers fighting over the strange foreign object, tribal leader Xi (N!xau) decides to take the bottle back to the gods to restore peace. His journey to the "end of the world" eventually has him crossing paths with a bumbling scientist (Marius Weyers) and a band of guerrillas who take a schoolteacher (Sandra Prinsloo) and her class hostage.

programme.title: Cocoon
programme.desc: Oscar-winning fantasy in which the residents of a Florida rest home get a new lease of life when they stumble across an alien "fountain of youth" in a disused holiday home. Unbeknown to them, aliens have been using the swimming pool in the house to store their cocooned brethren, giving the waters a powerful, rejuvenating quality.

programme.title: Warning Sign
programme.desc: Research scientists are turned into homicidal maniacs when a secret germ-warfare experiment goes haywire.

programme.title: Alien
programme.desc: In deep space, the crew of the commercial starship Nostromo is awakened from their cryo-sleep capsules halfway through their journey home to investigate a distress call from an alien vessel. The terror begins when the crew encounters a nest of eggs inside the alien ship. An organism from inside an egg leaps out and attaches itself to one of the crew, causing him to fall into a coma.

actor.role: Warrant Officer Lt. Ellen L. Ripley

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: Mercenary leader Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) and his loyal men take on what they think is a routine assignment: a covert operation to invade the South American country of Vilena and overthrow its dictator. But, when they learn that the job will be a suicide mission, they must choose redemption or the destruction of their brotherhood.

programme.title: The Expendables 2
programme.desc: Mercenary leader Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone), Lee Christmas (Jason Statham) and the rest of the Expendables team reunite when Mr. Church (Bruce Willis) hires them for a seemingly easy job. But things go terribly wrong, compelling the mercenaries to seek revenge for a comrade's murder. With the odds against them, Barney and his team are hell-bent on payback and cut a path of destruction through opposing forces, only to encounter an unexpected threat: six pounds of weapons-grade plutonium.

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: Gary "Eggsy" Unwin (Taron Egerton), whose late father secretly worked for a spy organization, lives in a South London housing estate and seems headed for a life behind bars. However, dapper agent Harry Hart (Colin Firth) recognizes potential in the youth and recruits him to be a trainee in the secret service. Meanwhile, villainous Richmond Valentine (Samuel L. Jackson) launches a diabolical plan to solve the problem of climate change via a worldwide killing spree.

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: With their headquarters destroyed and the world held hostage, members of Kingsman find new allies when they discover a spy organization in the United States known as Statesman. In an adventure that tests their strength and wits, the elite secret agents from both sides of the pond band together to battle a ruthless enemy and save the day, something that's becoming a bit of a habit for Eggsy.

programme.title: The Darkest Minds
programme.desc: When teens mysteriously develop powerful new abilities, they are declared a threat by the government and detained. One of the most powerful young people, Ruby, escapes from her camp and joins a group of runaways who are seeking a safe haven. Betrayed by the adults in power, this newfound family soon realizes that running is not enough -- they must use their collective powers to wage a resistance and take back their future.

programme.title: Power Book II: Ghost
programme.desc: Davis questions Tariq's client referrals; Cane finds Brayden eager to prove himself and gives him the chance to make some real money; Zeke needs everyone's help to assure his professional basketball future is protected.

programme.title: Dawn of the Dead
programme.desc: When her husband is attacked by a zombified neighbor, Ana (Sarah Polley) manages to escape, only to realize her entire Milwaukee neighborhood has been overrun by the walking dead. After being questioned by cautious policeman Kenneth (Ving Rhames), Ana joins him and a small group that gravitates to the local shopping mall as a bastion of safety. Once they convince suspicious security guards that they are not contaminated, the group bands together to fight the undead hordes.

programme.title: Fantasy Island
programme.desc: The enigmatic Mr. Roarke makes the secret dreams of his guests come true at a luxurious tropical resort. But when the fantasies turn into nightmares, the visitors must soon solve the island's mystery in order to escape with their lives.

programme.title: Hightown
programme.desc: Ray is so close to getting everything he's wanted, but he will have to maneuver things just right; Jackie comes to a crossroad and must choose how to move forward.

programme.title: The Girl Next Door
programme.desc: Eighteen-year-old Matthew Kidman (Emile Hirsch) is a straight-arrow overachiever who has never really lived life... until he falls for his new neighbor, the beautiful and seemingly innocent Danielle (Elisha Cuthbert). When Matthew discovers this perfect girl next door is a one-time porn star, his sheltered existence begins to spin out of control. Ultimately, Danielle helps Matthew emerge from his shell and discover that sometimes you have to risk everything for the person you love.

programme.title: The Craft: Legacy
programme.desc: An eclectic foursome of aspiring teenage witches get more than they bargained for as they lean into their newfound powers.

programme.title: Stomp the Yard
programme.desc: After his brother's death, a troubled but gifted street dancer enrolls in Atlanta's Truth University. As he tries to concentrate on his studies and woo a pretty classmate, he finds himself in the middle of a tug-of-war between fraternities, who want to utilize his talents in an upcoming dance competition.

programme.title: Fantasy Island
programme.desc: The enigmatic Mr. Roarke makes the secret dreams of his guests come true at a luxurious tropical resort. But when the fantasies turn into nightmares, the visitors must soon solve the island's mystery in order to escape with their lives.

programme.title: Hightown

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones
programme.desc: In New York City, a seemingly ordinary teenager named Clary Fray (Lily Collins) learns that she is descended from a line of Shadowhunters -- half-angel warriors who protect humanity from evil forces. After her mother (Lena Headey) disappears, Clary joins forces with a group of Shadowhunters and enters Downworld, an alternate realm filled with demons, vampires and a host of other creatures. Clary and her companions must find and protect an ancient cup that holds the key to her mother's future.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: In April 2009, the U.S. containership Maersk Alabama sails toward its destination on a day that seems like any other. Suddenly, Somali pirates race toward the vessel, climb aboard and take everyone hostage. The captain of the ship, Richard Phillips (Tom Hanks), looks to protect his crew from the hostile invaders, and their leader, Muse (Barkhad Abdi). The pirates are after millions of dollars, and Phillips must use his wits to make sure everyone survives and returns home safely.

programme.title: The Kid Detective
programme.desc: A once-celebrated kid detective, now 31, continues to solve the same trivial mysteries between hangovers and bouts of self-pity. But a naive client brings him his first adult case -- to find out who brutally murdered her boyfriend.

programme.title: Good
programme.desc: A young man becomes the caretaker of a wealthy old man facing his final months. As they become close, the old man's past sins force the caretaker to decide between his dreams and a pregnancy that could squander them all.

programme.title: The Unholy
programme.desc: A girl inexplicably gains the power to heal the sick after a supposed visitation from the Virgin Mary. As word spreads and people flock to witness her miracles, a disgraced journalist visits the small New England town to investigate. However, when strange events start to occur, he soon wonders if these phenomena are the result of something more sinister.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity
programme.desc: Soon after moving into a suburban tract home, Katie (Katie Featherston) and Micah (Micah Sloat) become increasingly disturbed by what appears to be a supernatural presence. Hoping to capture evidence of it on film, they set up video cameras in the house but are not prepared for the terrifying events that follow.

programme.title: Hightown
programme.desc: Renee risks everything to change her world around; Alan sets a trap that covers the entire Cape (New!).

programme.title: This Is the End
programme.desc: In Hollywood, actor James Franco is throwing a party with a slew of celebrity pals. Among those in attendance are his buddies Jonah Hill, Seth Rogen, Jay Baruchel, Danny McBride and Craig Robinson. Suddenly, an apocalypse of biblical proportions erupts, causing untold carnage among Tinseltown's elite and trapping Franco's party in his home. As the world they knew disintegrates outside, cabin fever and dwindling supplies threaten to tear the six friends apart.
